text:
\[
\begin{aligned}
F(t)= & \int\left(\frac{e^{t}}{4}+\frac{t e^{+}}{2}+\left(e^{-t}\right) d t\right. \\
& \int \frac{e^{+}}{4} d t=e^{t} \\
& \frac{1}{2} \int t e^{+} d t=\frac{1}{2}\left(t e^{t}-e^{+}\right)=\frac{e^{+}}{2}(t-1)
\end{aligned}
\]
\[
\begin{array}{l}
\text { So } F(t)=\frac{e^{t}}{4}+\frac{e^{2}}{2}(t+1)-C e^{-t}+D \\
x(t)=F(t) e^{-t}=\left(\frac{e^{t}}{4}+\frac{e^{2}}{2}(t-1)-C e^{-t}+D\right) e^{-t} \\
x(t)=\frac{1}{4}+\frac{t-1}{2}-\left(e^{-2 t}+D e^{-t}\right.
\end{array}
\]

After apply initial conditions: \( x(t)=\frac{1}{4}+\frac{t}{2}-\frac{1}{2} e^{-t}-\frac{1}{4} e^{-2 t} \)
